title: Home in a Heartbeat With Galey Alix
overview: The series will follow Galey, a full time Wall Street executive and DIY design dynamo on the weekends, as she uses her extraordinary do-it-yourself skills to give homeowners a new lease on life in just a few days' time. In each episode, she and her talented team will work unrelenting hours to turn out stunning home renovations that will provide these families, who are all selected from her massive social media following, the lift they've been needing.
